item.description:
Join us for our SIXTH annual holiday party, beginning at 1 p.m. Whether you've been to all the previous parties or you're joining us for the first time, you're invited--nay, encouraged--to join us for lots of fun. (Our current Activities Director Kate says: "I joined a few years ago and the holiday party was my first Meetup." And she kept coming back, so you know it must have been good.)

Please see the Message Board to learn about or sign up for the following:

1. The annual goodie bag exchange! Signups for this are now closed, but come to the party anyway. You'll see how this fabulous holiday tradition works and you can start thinking about participating next year. Meanwhile, you can read the details here: http://www.meetup.com/ne-atcs/messages/boards/thread/28381842

2. The fabulous holiday potluck! Every year, the feast is bigger and better than the year before. Sign up on the Message Board to contribute: http://www.meetup.com/ne-atcs/messages/boards/thread/28861302/0/#87917962

3. The annual Yankee Trader/White Elephant swap! You don't actually have to sign up for this activity in advance--even if you don't, you're welcome to participate. Either way, just follow the instructions on the Message Board: http://www.meetup.com/ne-atcs/messages/boards/thread/28739722 (Note to self: Dust off that porcelain plaque of Mrs. Santa Claus and wrap it up nicely...)

We'll have two ATC swaps this time: #1: Face (or faces) in the crowd AND #2, Artist's Choice. I've also gotten a large batch of cards from our sister ATC group in Georgia, so if you have solo cards you'd like to exchange, bring them along.

Also, we'll have door prizes. And more. Please join us.

Anne
item.how_to_find_us: Use door off parking lot (toward back of building)

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ December Meetup in Natick: Saturday, 12/1--Holiday Party!
